es.definition: Un mensaje publicitario que promociona un producto, servicio o evento; una forma de comunicación comercial.

pt.definition: Uma mensagem publicitária que promove um produto, serviço ou evento; uma forma de comunicação comercial.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A promotional message that advertises a product, service, or event; a form of commercial communication.
examples: They created an eye-catching advertisement for their new product.
Advertisements on social media can reach a wide audience.
The television advertisement featured a famous celebrity.

es.definition: Recomendaciones o sugerencias sobre qué hacer en una situación; información o opiniones dadas para ayudar a tomar decisiones.

pt.definition: Recomendações ou sugestões sobre o que fazer em uma situação; informações ou opiniões fornecidas para ajudar na tomada de decisões.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Palabras que nombran personas, animales, lugares, cosas, ideas o fenómenos.

definition: Recommendations or suggestions on what to do in a situation; information or opinions given to assist in decision-making.
examples: I sought advice from a financial expert before investing.
Her advice helped me make the right choice.
It's important to consider the advice of experienced professionals.

es.definition: Una persona que defiende o apoya una causa, idea o acción; promover o abogar por algo.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa que defende ou apoia uma causa, ideia ou ação; promover ou advogar algo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: A person who defends or supports a cause, idea, or action; to promote or advocate for something.
examples: She is a passionate advocate for animal rights.
The organization advocates for environmental conservation.
He advocated for changes in the healthcare system.

es.definition: Relacionado con la belleza, el arte o la apreciación de la belleza; un conjunto de principios o características estéticas.

pt.definition: Relacionado à beleza, à arte ou à apreciação da beleza; um conjunto de princípios ou características estéticas.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Related to beauty, art, or the appreciation of beauty; a set of aesthetic principles or characteristics.
examples: The museum's design has a modern aesthetic.
Her aesthetic sensibility is influenced by nature.
In art, aesthetics play a crucial role in interpretation.

es.definition: Un evento, situación o asunto que es objeto de interés o preocupación; una relación romántica o sexual fuera de una pareja establecida.

pt.definition: Um evento, situação ou assunto que é objeto de interesse ou preocupação; um relacionamento romântico ou sexual fora de um casal estabelecido.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: An event, situation, or matter that is the subject of interest or concern; a romantic or sexual relationship outside of an established couple.
examples: The political affair attracted widespread attention.
She had an affair with a colleague, which caused a scandal.
Managing personal affairs can be challenging.

es.definition: Sentir miedo o temor; tener miedo de algo o alguien.

pt.definition: Sentir medo ou temor; ter medo de algo ou alguém.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Feeling fear or apprehension; being afraid of something or someone.
examples: I'm afraid of heights, so I can't go on roller coasters.
She was afraid of the dark as a child.
Don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it.

es.definition: Una organización o entidad que lleva a cabo acciones o proporciona servicios en nombre de otros; la capacidad de tomar decisiones y actuar de manera independiente.

pt.definition: Uma organização ou entidade que realiza ações ou presta serviços em nome de outros; a capacidade de tomar decisões e agir de forma independente.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: An organization or entity that carries out actions or provides services on behalf of others; the ability to make decisions and act independently.
examples: The government agency is responsible for regulating the industry.
She has the agency to make decisions for her department.
Advertising agencies help companies promote their products.

es.definition: Una lista de tareas, eventos o temas a abordar en un momento específico; un plan o programa de trabajo.

pt.definition: Uma lista de tarefas, eventos ou temas a serem abordados em um momento específico; um plano ou programa de trabalho.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A list of tasks, events, or topics to be addressed at a specific time; a plan or program of work.
examples: I need to check my agenda for today's meetings.
The conference agenda includes several keynote speakers.
Creating a weekly agenda helps me stay organized.

es.definition: Una persona o entidad que actúa en nombre de otra persona o entidad; un representante o intermediario.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa ou entidade que age em nome de outra pessoa ou entidade; um representante ou intermediário.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A person or entity that acts on behalf of another person or entity; a representative or intermediary.
examples: The real estate agent helped us find our dream home.
She works as an agent for a famous actor.
The travel agent booked our vacation package.

es.definition: Comportamiento hostil o violento hacia los demás; la acción de atacar o dañar a otros.

pt.definition: Comportamento hostil ou violento em relação aos outros; a ação de atacar ou prejudicar os outros.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Hostile or violent behavior towards others; the action of attacking or harming others.
examples: The aggression in the playground was concerning.
International law condemns acts of aggression between nations.
Effective conflict resolution can reduce aggression.

es.definition: La ciencia y práctica de cultivar la tierra y criar animales para la producción de alimentos, fibras y otros productos agrícolas.

pt.definition: A ciência e prática de cultivar a terra e criar animais para a produção de alimentos, fibras e outros produtos agrícolas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The science and practice of cultivating the land and raising animals for the production of food, fibers, and other agricultural products.
examples: Agriculture plays a vital role in the economy of many countries.
Modern agriculture has introduced innovative farming techniques.
Farmers are essential to the success of agriculture.

es.definition: Una persona que ayuda o presta asistencia a otra, especialmente a una figura de autoridad; un asistente.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa que ajuda ou presta assistência a outra, especialmente a uma figura de autoridade; um assistente.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A person who helps or provides assistance to another, especially a figure of authority; an assistant.
examples: The president's aide briefed him on the latest developments.
The teacher's aide helped students with their assignments.
He worked as an aide to the CEO of the company.

es.definition: Apuntar o dirigir algo hacia un objetivo específico; tener la intención de lograr algo.

pt.definition: Apontar ou dirigir algo para um objetivo específico; ter a intenção de alcançar algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: To point or direct something toward a specific target; to intend to achieve something.
examples: The archer aimed the arrow at the bullseye.
She aimed to become a successful entrepreneur.
His aim was to improve the community through education.

es.definition: Máquinas más pesadas que el aire diseñadas para volar, como aviones y helicópteros; cualquier vehículo aéreo.

pt.definition: Máquinas mais pesadas que o ar projetadas para voar, como aviões e helicópteros; qualquer veículo aéreo.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: Heavier-than-air machines designed for flight, such as airplanes and helicopters; any aerial vehicle.
examples: Commercial aircraft have advanced safety features.
Military aircraft are used for defense and reconnaissance.
The airport is equipped to handle various types of aircraft.

es.definition: Una empresa que proporciona servicios de transporte aéreo para pasajeros y carga; la compañía aérea que opera vuelos programados.

pt.definition: Uma empresa que fornece serviços de transporte aéreo para passageiros e carga; a companhia aérea que opera voos programados.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A company that provides air transportation services for passengers and cargo; the airline that operates scheduled flights.
examples: I booked my ticket with a reputable airline.
The airline industry has faced challenges during the pandemic.
There are many international airlines that offer flights.

es.definition: Una instalación diseñada para la llegada, salida y mantenimiento de aeronaves, así como para el embarque y desembarque de pasajeros y carga.

pt.definition: Uma instalação projetada para a chegada, partida e manutenção de aeronaves, bem como para o embarque e desembarque de passageiros e carga.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A facility designed for the arrival, departure, and maintenance of aircraft, as well as the boarding and disembarking of passengers and cargo.
examples: The airport was bustling with travelers.
Security measures are strict at international airports.
They announced a new airport terminal expansion.

es.definition: Una señal o dispositivo que advierte o notifica de un peligro, emergencia o evento no deseado; causar miedo o preocupación.

pt.definition: Um sinal ou dispositivo que alerta ou notifica sobre perigo, emergência ou evento indesejado; causar medo ou preocupação.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: A signal or device that warns or notifies of danger, emergency, or unwanted event; to cause fear or concern.
examples: The fire alarm alerted everyone to evacuate the building.
She felt a sense of alarm when she heard the news.
The loud noise alarmed the neighbors.

es.definition: Un libro o álbum en el que se pueden pegar fotografías, recortes u otros recuerdos; una colección de grabaciones de música.

pt.definition: Um livro ou álbum no qual podem ser coladas fotografias, recortes ou outras lembranças; uma coleção de gravações de música.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A book or album in which photographs, clippings, or other mementos can be glued; a collection of music recordings.
examples: She created a beautiful photo album of her travels.
The band released their latest album last month.
Collecting vintage albums is a popular hobby.

es.definition: Una sustancia química que se encuentra en bebidas alcohólicas como el vino, la cerveza y los licores; también se usa en productos de limpieza y desinfección.

pt.definition: Uma substância química encontrada em bebidas alcoólicas como vinho, cerveja e destilados; também é usada em produtos de limpeza e desinfecção.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A chemical substance found in alcoholic beverages such as wine, beer, and spirits; it is also used in cleaning and disinfecting products.
examples: He decided to quit drinking alcohol for his health.
Rubbing alcohol is used as a disinfectant in hospitals.
There are strict regulations regarding the sale of alcohol.

es.definition: Un ser de otro planeta o de otro lugar del universo; extranjero o ajeno a una cultura o lugar.

pt.definition: Um ser de outro planeta ou de outro lugar do universo; estrangeiro ou estranho a uma cultura ou lugar.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

She felt like an alien in a foreign country.
The movie is about an alien invasion.

es.definition: Colocar o ajustar cosas en una línea recta o en una posición correcta; estar en acuerdo o en armonía con algo.

pt.definition: Colocar ou ajustar coisas em linha reta ou na posição correta; estar em acordo ou harmonia com algo.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: To place or adjust things in a straight line or in the correct position; to be in agreement or harmony with something.
examples: Please align the text with the left margin.
Their goals and values align with our company's mission.
The planets align once in a while for a rare celestial event.

es.definition: Similar o parecido en apariencia, naturaleza o características; en la misma medida o grado.

pt.definition: Semelhante ou parecido em aparência, natureza ou características; na mesma medida ou grau.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Adverb

definition: Similar or alike in appearance, nature, or characteristics; to the same extent or degree.
examples: The twins look very much alike.
Their opinions on the matter are alike.
The two cars are nearly alike in design and features.

es.definition: Estar vivo; en estado de vida; en existencia o en funcionamiento.

pt.definition: Estar vivo; em estado de vida; em existência ou funcionamento.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Words that modify verbs, adjectives, other adverbs, or entire sentences.

definition: To be living; in a state of life; in existence or functioning.

The city comes alive at night with its vibrant nightlife.
She felt more alive when she was in nature.

es.definition: Una declaración sin pruebas o evidencia que acusa a alguien de cometer un delito o una acción incorrecta.

pt.definition: Uma declaração sem provas ou evidência que acusa alguém de cometer um crime ou ação errada.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A statement without proof or evidence that accuses someone of committing a crime or wrongful action.
examples: The allegation of corruption led to an investigation.
He denied the allegations of misconduct at work.
The newspaper published allegations of political wrongdoing.

es.definition: Asignar o distribuir recursos, tareas o responsabilidades de manera específica; reservar o destinar algo para un propósito particular.

pt.definition: Atribuir ou distribuir recursos, tarefas ou responsabilidades de maneira específica; reservar ou destinar algo para um propósito específico.

type_word.name: Verb

Let's allocate a portion of the budget for marketing.

es.definition: Una cantidad de dinero regular que se otorga o se permite; una cantidad de algo permitida o tolerada.

pt.definition: Uma quantia de dinheiro regular concedida ou permitida; uma quantidade de algo permitida ou tolerada.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

The teacher made an allowance for students with special needs.
There's a small allowance of extra time for this task.

es.definition: Una persona, grupo o nación que se une o se asocia con otra para lograr un objetivo común; apoyar o unirse a alguien en una causa o lucha.

pt.definition: Uma pessoa, grupo ou nação que se une ou se associa a outra para alcançar um objetivo comum; apoiar ou se unir a alguém em uma causa ou luta.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: A person, group, or nation that joins or associates with another to achieve a common goal; to support or unite with someone in a cause or struggle.

She considered him her closest ally in the workplace.

es.definition: Casi o cerca de algo, pero no completamente; en su mayor parte.

pt.definition: Quase ou perto de algo, mas não completamente; na maior parte.

type_word.name: Adverb

definition: Nearly or close to something, but not entirely; for the most part.
examples: He almost missed his flight because of traffic.
She's almost finished with her homework.
The cake is almost ready to be served.

es.definition: Estar solitario o sin compañía de otros; únicamente o sin la ayuda o presencia de otros.

pt.definition: Estar solitário ou sem companhia de outros; apenas ou sem a ajuda ou presença de outros.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Words that modify verbs, adjectives, other adverbs, or entire sentences.

The house felt eerily quiet when everyone was gone, and he was alone.

es.definition: Cambiar o modificar algo, a menudo de manera pequeña o parcial; hacer ajustes o cambios en algo.

pt.definition: Mudar ou modificar algo, frequentemente de forma pequena ou parcial; fazer ajustes ou mudanças em algo.

type_word.name: Verb

examples: She decided to alter her dress to make it fit better.
The architect had to alter the original design due to budget constraints.

es.definition: Una opción o posibilidad diferente a la principal; que ofrece una elección entre dos o más cosas.

pt.definition: Uma opção ou possibilidade diferente da principal; que oferece uma escolha entre duas ou mais coisas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

The alternative route is faster but has more traffic.

es.definition: La altura de un objeto o lugar sobre el nivel del mar u otra superficie de referencia; la altitud también se refiere a una posición o nivel en términos abstractos.

pt.definition: A altura de um objeto ou local acima do nível do mar ou outra superfície de referência; altitude também se refere a uma posição ou nível em termos abstratos.

examples: The airplane reached a cruising altitude of 30,000 feet.
The city's high altitude can lead to thinner air.
In the corporate world, reaching a high altitude often requires hard work and dedication.

es.definition: En total; completamente; en su conjunto.

pt.definition: No total; completamente; como um todo.

type_word.name: Adverb
type_word.description: Words that modify verbs, adjectives, other adverbs, or entire sentences.

definition: In total; completely; as a whole.
examples: Altogether, there were 100 people at the event.
The plan failed altogether.
She considered the project as a success altogether.

es.definition: Un metal plateado ligero que es resistente a la corrosión y se usa en una variedad de aplicaciones, incluyendo la fabricación de envases, utensilios de cocina y componentes de vehículos.

pt.definition: Um metal prateado leve que é resistente à corrosão e é usado em uma variedade de aplicações, incluindo a fabricação de embalagens, utensílios de cozinha e componentes de veículos.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

examples: Aluminum foil is commonly used for wrapping food.
The car's body is made of aluminum for weight reduction.
The aerospace industry relies on aluminum alloys for aircraft construction.

es.definition: Causar asombro o sorpresa; impresionar o dejar a alguien sin palabras debido a algo extraordinario.

pt.definition: Causar espanto ou surpresa; impressionar ou deixar alguém sem palavras devido a algo extraordinário.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: To cause wonder or surprise; to impress or leave someone speechless due to something extraordinary.
examples: His magic tricks never fail to amaze the audience.
The breathtaking view from the mountain summit amazed her.
I amaze myself with my own capabilities sometimes.

es.definition: Un diplomático de alto rango enviado por un país como representante oficial en otro país; una persona que promueve o defiende una causa o actividad.

pt.definition: Um diplomata de alto nível enviado por um país como representante oficial em outro país; uma pessoa que promove ou defende uma causa ou atividade.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A high-ranking diplomat sent by one country as an official representative in another country; a person who promotes or advocates for a cause or activity.
examples: The ambassador played a crucial role in diplomatic negotiations.
She is an ambassador for environmental conservation.
The company appointed him as their brand ambassador.

es.definition: Tener un fuerte deseo de éxito, poder, riqueza o logros; mostrando determinación y esfuerzo para alcanzar metas elevadas.

pt.definition: Ter um forte desejo de sucesso, poder, riqueza ou realizações; demonstrando determinação e esforço para alcançar metas elevadas.

type_word.name: Adjective
type_word.description: Words that describe or modify nouns.

definition: Having a strong desire for success, power, wealth, or achievements; showing determination and effort to reach lofty goals.
examples: She has ambitious plans for her career.
The ambitious project required a dedicated team.
His ambitious nature drives him to aim high in life.

es.definition: Hacer cambios o correcciones en algo, especialmente en un texto, ley, o documento; mejorar o enmendar errores.

pt.definition: Fazer alterações ou correções em algo, especialmente em um texto, lei ou documento; melhorar ou corrigir erros.

type_word.name: Verb

definition: To make changes or corrections to something, especially to a text, law, or document; to improve or rectify errors.
examples: They need to amend the contract to include the new terms.

He apologized and promised to amend his behavior.

es.definition: Una enmienda o cambio realizado en un texto, ley o documento existente; una adición o modificación a algo ya establecido.

pt.definition: Uma alteração ou mudança feita em um texto, lei ou documento existente; uma adição ou modificação a algo já estabelecido.

type_word.name: Noun

definition: An alteration or change made to an existing text, law, or document; an addition or modification to something already established.
examples: The Constitution has seen multiple amendments over the years.

They submitted an amendment to the contract for review.

es.definition: En medio de; en un contexto de o rodeado por algo.

pt.definition: No meio de; em um contexto de ou cercado por algo.

type_word.name: Preposition

definition: In the middle of; in a context of or surrounded by something.
examples: The celebrations continued amid the heavy rain.

Amid the challenges, they managed to succeed.

es.definition: La cantidad total de algo; la suma o total de una colección de cosas.

pt.definition: A quantidade total de algo; a soma ou total de uma coleção de coisas.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: The total quantity of something; the sum or total of a collection of things.

What is the total amount of your expenses this month?
His efforts amount to nothing if he doesn't complete the project.

es.definition: Entretener o divertir a alguien; proporcionar entretenimiento o diversión.

pt.definition: Entreter ou divertir alguém; proporcionar entretenimento ou diversão.

type_word.name: Verb
type_word.description: Words that express actions, states, or processes.

definition: To entertain or amuse someone; to provide entertainment or fun.
examples: The magician's tricks never failed to amuse the children.
She amuses herself by solving crossword puzzles.
The comedy show was designed to amuse the audience.

es.definition: Una comparación entre dos cosas que tienen características similares; una similitud o relación entre dos cosas que son diferentes en otros aspectos.

pt.definition: Uma comparação entre duas coisas que têm características semelhantes; uma semelhança ou relação entre duas coisas que são diferentes em outros aspectos.

type_word.name: Noun

definition: A comparison between two things that have similar characteristics; a similarity or relationship between two things that are different in other aspects.
examples: He used an analogy to explain the complex scientific concept.
Drawing an analogy between the two situations helped clarify the issue.
Analogies are often used in literature to convey deeper meanings.

es.definition: Un miembro de la familia que vivió en una generación anterior; un antepasado o progenitor.

pt.definition: Um membro da família que viveu em uma geração anterior; um ancestral ou progenitor.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: A member of the family who lived in a previous generation; an ancestor or progenitor.

The ancient ruins are a testament to the achievements of our ancestors.

pt.definition: Um dispositivo usado para fixar uma embarcação em seu lugar, geralmente consistindo de uma corda ou corrente lançada na água e enganchada no fundo; também se refere a uma fonte de estabilidade ou apoio.

type_word.name: Noun

definition: A distinctive quality or attribute of something or someone; a property that defines or identifies something.
examples: One characteristic of this species is its bright red color.
Attention to detail is a characteristic of a good chef.
The characteristic smell of roses filled the room.

es.definition: La acción de ayudar o brindar apoyo a los necesitados, generalmente a través de donaciones de dinero, comida, ropa, etc.; la compasión y la benevolencia hacia los menos afortunados.

pt.definition: A ação de ajudar ou dar apoio aos necessitados, geralmente através de doações de dinheiro, comida, roupas, etc.; a compaixão e a benevolência para com os menos afortunados.

type_word.name: Noun
type_word.description: Words that name people, animals, places, things, ideas, or phenomena.

definition: The action of helping or providing support to those in need, typically through donations of money, food, clothing, etc.; compassion and benevolence toward the less fortunate.
examples: The charity organization provides food to homeless people.
Many people engage in acts of charity during the holiday season.
Her charity work has made a positive impact on the community.
